means: 阿尔及尔（阿尔及利亚首都）

sentence.Network_en: His abhorrence of racism led him to write The Algiers Motel Incident.
sentence.Network_cn: 对种族主义的憎恨促使他写了《阿尔及尔汽车旅馆事件》一书。

sentence.Network_en: He was sorry for the soldier who lay dying in Algiers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为那位奄奄一息地倒在阿尔及尔的士兵而难过.

sentence.Network_en: Von Arnim was brought through Algiers on his way to captivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿纳姆被送往俘虏营途经阿尔及尔.

auth_sentence.content: It was inspired, he says, by a spur-of-the-moment trip to Algiers many years ago with travel writer Bruce Chatwin.
